# Representation

**Associated Type**

The type of the representation used to import and export the item.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Representation : TransferRepresentation
```

## Discussion

Swift infers this type from the return value of the [doc://com.apple.CoreTransferable/documentation/CoreTransferable/Transferable/transferRepresentation] property.

## Implementing a transfer representation

- **transferRepresentation**: The representation used to import and export the item.

items.description: The representation used to import and export the item.
